entry.title: Thursday: Chance of light snow. High minus 22. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of light snow this morning. Clearing this afternoon. Blowing snow at times. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 this afternoon. High minus 22. Wind chill minus 42 this morning and minus 33 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:00 AM CST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 29.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy overnight. Wind northeast 30 km/h. Low minus 29. Wind chill minus 44 this evening and minus 36 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:00 AM CST Thursday 02 March 2023
